altername_name: クラッシュ・バンディクー カーニバル
name: Crash Bandicoot Collection
overview: This compilation includes the following titles complete: Crash Bandicoot Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back Crash Bandicoot 3: Warped The only thing removed was the demo for "Spyro the Dragon" in Crash 3 that could be played through a code.
